trans-unit.source: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Representa controlos que atuam como contentores para uma coleção de elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The children of this element support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref> and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.
trans-unit.target: O subordinado deste suporte de elemento <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref> e estão organizados por um sistema de coordenadas lógico two-dimensional que podem ser atravessado por linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> with the distinction that any control that supports TablePattern also exposes a column or row header relationship, or both, for each child element.
trans-unit.target: Neste padrão de controlo é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>com distinção que qualquer controlo que suporte TablePattern também expõe uma coluna ou relação de cabeçalho de linha ou ambos, para cada elemento subordinado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>

trans-unit.source: Controls that support the TablePattern control pattern also support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern> control pattern in order to provide access to the inherent grid functionality of a table.
trans-unit.target: Controlos que suportam o controlo de TablePattern também padrão suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>padrão de controlo para fornecer acesso à funcionalidade de grelha inerente de uma tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [controlo padrão de mapeamento para os clientes de automatização de IU](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter exemplos de controlos que podem implementar este padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache devem ter sido anteriormente pedidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade pedida não está na cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the collection of column headers for a table.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que obtém a coleção de cabeçalhos de coluna de uma tabela.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The order of the headers returned will be consistent within a provider, but not necessarily across providers.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos cabeçalhos devolvidos irá ser consistente dentro de um fornecedor, mas não necessariamente em fornecedores.

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não está presente e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>tem de ser obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este padrão tem de ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contém apenas os dados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor em cache de uma propriedade que foi anteriormente especificado utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"> </xref> padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de padrão é transmitido para métodos de como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>obter o padrão de controlo de interesse do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the collection of row headers for a table.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que obtém a coleção de cabeçalhos de linha de uma tabela.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The order of the headers returned will be consistent within a provider, but not necessarily across providers.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos cabeçalhos devolvidos irá ser consistente dentro de um fornecedor, mas não necessariamente em fornecedores.

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não está presente e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>tem de ser obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation.RowOrColumnMajor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation.RowOrColumnMajor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern.TablePatternInformation.RowOrColumnMajor*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TablePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
